#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define PII pair <int, int> 
const int SQRT = 200; 
const int MAXN = 100005; 
int n, q; 
int upd [MAXN];
vector <int> o [MAXN];  
int add [SQRT + 5][SQRT + 5]; 
int main(){
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); 
	cin >> n >> q; 
	for (int g=0; g<q; g++){
		int a, b; cin >> a >> b; 
		if (a > SQRT){
			for (int y=b; y<=n; y+=a) upd[y]++; 
			continue; 
		}
		o[b].push_back(a); 
	}
	for (int g=1; g<=n; g++){
		for (int y : o[g]){ // jump is y
			add[g%y][y]++; 
		}
		for (int y=1; y<=SQRT; y++) upd[g]+=add[g%y][y]; 
	}
	for (int g=1; g<=n; g++) cout << upd[g] << ' '; 
	return 0; 
}
